reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Menu' link to show the navigation menu items.
Click the 'Configuration' menu link.
Click the 'Menu' link to hide the navigation menu items.
Click the 'Simple EXIF/IPTC Mappings' link.
Select the 'Title' option from the 'Alt Text' drop down list.
Select the 'Title' option from the 'Title Text' drop down list.
Select the 'Caption' option from the 'Caption' drop down list.
Select the 'Copyright' option from the 'Copyright' drop down list.
Select the 'Credit' option from the 'Credit' drop down list.
Select the 'Keywords' option from the 'Keywords' drop down list.
Select the 'none' option from the 'Media categories' drop down list.
Select the 'Title' option from the 'Media Tags' drop down list.
Select the 'Source' option from the 'Source' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Menu' link to show the navigation menu items.
Click the 'Content' menu link.
Click the 'Menu' link to hide the navigation menu items.
Click the 'Add content' link.
Click the 'Post' link.
Click the Cover Media 'Select' button.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'NUP_155306_0046' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Verify the 'Apply Embedded Metadata' button is present.
Assert that the Title Text box with index '1' value matches 'NUP_155306_0046.JPG'.
Assert that the Alt Text box with index '1' value matches 'NUP_155306_0046.JPG'.
Assert that the Source box with index '1' value matches 'Episodic'.
Assert that the Credit Text box with index '1' value matches 'Brownie Harris/NBC'.
Assert that the Copyright Text box with index '1' value matches '2013 NBCUniversal Media, LLC'.
Assert that the Keywords Text box with index '1' value matches 'NUP_155306, Revolution, Episode 118, Season 1'.
Enter '' in the 'Title Text' text box with index '1'.
Enter '' in the 'Source' text box with index '1'.
Click the 'Apply Embedded Metadata' button.

Assert that the Source box with index '1' value matches 'Episodic'.
Enter 'ModifiedTitle.JPG' in the 'Title Text' text box with index '1'.
Enter 'ModifiedSource' in the 'Source' text box with index '1'.

Assert that the Source box with index '1' value matches 'ModifiedSource'.
